thought: The question asks whether the net profit under the Petroleum Income Tax Act is subject to income tax. The answer clearly states that it is subject to income tax according to the law, and it also references the relevant law section that supports this answer. The answer is straightforward and does not require further elaboration.
answer: ต้องเสียภาษีเงินได้ตาม พระราชบัญญัติภาษีเงินได้ปิโตรเลียม พ.ศ. 2514
